code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:33 year old M lobbyist presents with moderate abdominal pain. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol he denies smoking o:Height 176 cm, Weight 91 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 14, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed pantoprazole - 40 mg daily, and ordered Reticulocyte Count.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination

td.content: s:white m aged 34 Ys presents with moderate abdominal pain. o:Height 177 cm, Weight 94.1 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed omeprazole - 20 mg IV daily (4-8 week treatment), and ordered CBC with Manual Differential.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination
